new.note: This update includes various enhancements and fixes aimed at improving user experience and application performance. Stay tuned for the upcoming features to make your experience even more seamless.

changes.description: Our summarizing tool now automatically resets with each new page you visit, ensuring a fresh start for every read.

changes.description: Experience our new login and account pages, redesigned for a sleeker look and a more secure sign-in process.

fixes.description: We've cleaned up the UI, fixing cluttered features and buttons for a smoother navigation experience across Helperbird.

upcoming.description: Stay tuned! A dedicated bug report feature is on its way, making it easier for you to share feedback and help us improve.

changes.title: Increased Limit for Free Users in Immersive Reader
changes.description: Big news for our free users! The Immersive Reader's character limit has been bumped up to a generous 2400. More reading, more learning!

changes.title: Spanish Support Now in Text/Screenshot Reader
changes.description: Our text/screenshot reader is going global! Embrace the diversity with our new Spanish and Arabic language support.

changes.title: Arabic Support Now in Text/Screenshot Reader
changes.description: Our text/screenshot reader is going global! Embrace the diversity with our new Spanish and Arabic language support.

changes.title: Alt Text, Your Way
changes.description: Personalize your web experience with our new alt text options. Image descriptions and link alt texts are now separate, giving you the choice to see what matters most to you.

changes.title: Introducing a Sleeker, More Focused Reading Mode
changes.description: Dive into a cleaner and more intuitive Reading Mode. We've streamlined the look for a distraction-free reading experience that you'll love.

changes.title: Math Learning with Our Maths Reader Beta
changes.description: Introducing the Maths Reader Beta! Snap a math problem and watch it come to life in the Immersive Reader. Perfect for learning or quick help with homework. Your feedback can shape its future!

changes.title: Text/Screenshot Reader Now with Translations
changes.description: Your translation tasks just got easier! Our enhanced text/screenshot tool now comes with a built-in translator. Instantly translate text for a seamless multilingual experience.

changes.title: Immersive Reader  in Text/Screenshot Tool
changes.description: We've integrated the Immersive Reader directly into our text/screenshot tool. Now, opening and reading your screenshots is more straightforward and efficient than ever!

changes.title: New, Streamlined Search Bar
changes.description: Looking for something? Find it in a flash with our sleek new search bar. A smoother, more intuitive Helperbird is just a search away.

changes.title: Dark Mode Arrives
changes.description: It's here! Dark Mode arrives in Helperbird, bringing with it a stylish and eye-friendly interface. Perfect for those late-night study sessions or early morning browsing.

fixes.title: Highlight menu bug
fixes.description: We've squashed a pesky bug! Now, the highlight menu won't interfere with your Immersive Reader experience, making your reading smoother than ever.

upcoming.title: Revamping our Website
upcoming.description: Get ready to be wowed! A brand new Helperbird website is on its way, promising a cleaner and more user-friendly interface. Stay tuned for an online experience like never before!

changes.title: PDF Reader Just Got an Upgrade!
changes.description: Exciting news! Our PDF reader now opens directly from Google Drive and Classroom, and guess what? It supports all the amazing Helperbird features!

changes.title: Light as a Feather!
changes.description: We've worked some magic to make Helperbird super light on your computer. Now saving a whopping 60% on RAM!

changes.title: Reading Mode Redesigned!
changes.description: Our Reading Mode has a fresh new look, and it's better than ever! Nearly all Helperbird features work seamlessly within it.

changes.title: Voice Typing Smooth as Silk
changes.description: We've given voice typing a makeover, making it smoother and more intuitive. Speak away effortlessly!

changes.title: Sticky Notes, Now Stickier and Prettier!
changes.description: Our sticky notes have been revamped with better icons and a fresh design. Get ready to stick your thoughts everywhere!

changes.title: Real-Time App Updates
changes.description: We're now updating in real-time! Features not supported in docs or PDFs will be smartly disabled. Keeping things neat and tidy!

changes.title: Smoother Keyboard Navigation
changes.description: We've updated our keyboard navigation to be smoother and more intuitive. Navigate with ease!

changes.title: Alt Tags Updated App-Wide
changes.description: We've refreshed alt tags across the app for a more accessible experience.

changes.title: Immersive Reader at Lightning Speed
changes.description: Hold onto your hats! Our Immersive Reader is now faster and remembers your settings!

changes.title: Modals for Filters and Configuration
changes.description: Introducing modals for filters and configuration in the Helperbird apps. Configuring just got a whole lot cooler!

changes.title: Document Editor Reimagined
changes.description: Our document editor has a brand-new look! Enjoy enhanced writing breakdowns, exporting options, and more.

upcoming.title: Night Owls Rejoice with Dark Mode!
upcoming.description: Get ready for a sleeker, easier-on-the-eyes experience with our upcoming Dark Mode!

upcoming.title: Immersive Reader in the OCR Tool
upcoming.description: We're bringing the power of Immersive Reader to our OCR tool. Stay tuned!

upcoming.title: Maths Support in Immersive Reader
upcoming.description: Maths is getting friendlier with upcoming support in our Immersive Reader. Math lovers, this one's for you!

changes.title: PowerPoint Support for Online
changes.description: We've added support for PowerPoint online, enhancing your productivity.

changes.title: Dyslexia Features in Their Own Cards
changes.description: Dyslexia features now have dedicated cards for improved accessibility.

changes.title: UI Tweaks for a Cleaner Look
changes.description: We've made UI tweaks to provide a cleaner and more intuitive experience.

changes.title: Summarize Mode Integrated
changes.description: The Summarize mode is now seamlessly integrated into the app for your convenience.

changes.title: Paragraph Features in Their Own Card
changes.description: Paragraph-related features now have their dedicated card for easy access.

changes.title: Enhanced Volume Booster
changes.description: Our volume booster is now available and works with both videos and audio.

changes.title: Automatic PDF Opening in Google Classroom
changes.description: Google Classroom now allows automatic opening of PDFs for a smoother workflow.

changes.title: Touch Support for Sliders
changes.description: Sliders across the app now fully support touch interactions.

changes.title: Shortcuts are free again
changes.description: Shortcuts were made paid while we fixed a bug. They are now free again.

changes.title: Improved Accessibility for Sliders
changes.description: Sliders now have better text and translations, enhancing their accessibility.

changes.title: Bug Fix: Text-to-Speech Player
changes.description: We've fixed a bug where the Text-to-Speech player would occasionally not stop or work on iOS and Chrome.

changes.title: Enhanced PII Removal for Immersive Reader
changes.description: We've improved our PII (Personally Identifiable Information) removal function. We now remove sensitive information locally, adding an extra layer of protection for Immersive Reader users.

upcoming.title: Coming Soon: Google Docs and Slides Add-on
upcoming.description: Stay tuned for our upcoming release where the Google Docs and Slides addon will be bundled and available for use.

upcoming.title: Coming Soon: Helperbird for Android
upcoming.description: We're excited to announce that Helperbird will soon be available for Android users, expanding our reach to a wider audience.

upcoming.title: Coming Soon: Helperbird for Firefox on Android
upcoming.description: Get ready for the Helperbird experience on Firefox for Android. Coming soon to enhance your browsing on mobile devices.

changes.title: New Reading Mode Design
changes.description: We've updated the Reading Mode to be more responsive, now fully supporting smaller screens.

changes.title: Follow Mouse Feature for Dyslexia Ruler
changes.description: The dyslexia ruler now includes a 'follow mouse' feature, offering an enhanced user experience.

changes.title: Restored 'Add to Reading List' Functionality
changes.description: Due to popular demand, the 'Add to Reading List' feature has been reinstated.

changes.title: Sync Toggle
changes.description: You now have the option to turn syncing on or off.

changes.title: In-app Update Notifications
changes.description: Updates will no longer display on a separate page, streamlining the update process.

changes.title: Redesigned Settings Page
changes.description: The settings page has been redesigned for improved usability.

changes.title: Import Helperbird Settings
changes.description: You can now import your Helperbird settings for easier setup on new devices.

changes.title: Export Helperbird Notes and Settings
changes.description: We've added the ability to export both Helperbird notes and settings.

changes.title: Shorter Codes for Districts
changes.description: District codes have been shortened for easier access.

changes.title: Extended Immersive Reader Limit
changes.description: Immersive Reader on Helperbird Free now supports up to 1800 characters.

changes.title: Immersive Reader for PDFs
changes.description: Immersive Reader is now compatible with PDF files.

changes.title: Coupon Prompt
changes.description: Show a Helperbird prompt and receive a special coupon.

changes.title: Extended Reworder Limit
changes.description: The Reworder feature now supports up to 1000 characters.

changes.title: Fixed Trial Year Display
changes.description: Resolved an issue where the trial period incorrectly displayed as starting in 1970.

changes.title: Added Reading Mode Themes
changes.description: New themes are now available in Reading Mode.

changes.title: Custom Fonts in Reading Mode
changes.description: Reading Mode now supports custom fonts for a more personalized reading experience.

changes.title: Microsoft Word Support
changes.description: Helperbird is now compatible with Microsoft Word.

upcoming.title: Upcoming Features
upcoming.description: Stay tuned for more exciting updates in our next release.

changes.title: Redesigned Settings Page
changes.description: We've revamped the settings page for a more intuitive user experience.

changes.title: Improved Dyslexia Rulers
changes.description: The dyslexia rulers are now less buggy, making reading easier for users with dyslexia.

changes.title: PDF Reader Enhancements
changes.description: Added 4 new features to the PDF reader, including OCR and page support. You can now open PDFs with a single click, no download required.

changes.title: New Summarize Engine
changes.description: Our new summarization engine helps you get the gist of long articles and documents quickly.

changes.title: Side Panel UI for Edge and Firefox
changes.description: We've extended the side panel UI to Microsoft Edge and Firefox for a consistent user experience across browsers.

fixes.title: Addressed a bug that affected dictionary function on iPads, ensuring consistent functionality across devices.
Fixed z-index issues on sliders and badges, resulting in a smoother, more visually consistent user experience.
Rectified a bug where text-to-speech color highlighting didn't function upon change, enhancing readability and user interaction.
Fixed an issue with the word prediction feature in Google Docs where it added a word three times, ensuring accurate and efficient predictive text.

upcoming.title: Upcoming Features
upcoming.description: In our next release, look forward to a new Reading Mode and an upgraded voice typing engine.

changes.title: Quick Actions Personalization
changes.description: Users can now remove all default quick actions and set their own features, adding another layer of personalization to the Helperbird experience.

changes.title: Improved Voice Typing
changes.description: We've upgraded the voice typing feature. It now supports multiple languages and comes with an improved user interface.

changes.title: Enhanced Quick Actions Flexibility
changes.description: Users can now add all apps to the quick actions and remove all default apps, providing more control and customization options.

changes.title: Optimized Dimensions for iOS Devices
changes.description: A default height and width have been set for optimal usage on iPad and iPhone devices.

changes.title: Word Prediction
changes.description: Word prediction now leverages web components for improved performance.

changes.title: Citation Support
changes.description: Dragging notes into the editor now automatically adds a link to the original file, making referencing easier.

changes.title: Note Titles
changes.description: Users can now add titles to their notes for better organization.

changes.title: Text to Speech Enhancement
changes.description: Text to Speech is now faster, providing an even smoother user experience.

changes.title: New App Icons
changes.description: We've introduced new icons for several apps, adding a fresh look and feel to the platform.

changes.title: Web Search
changes.description: Users can now quickly search the web directly from Helperbird.

changes.title: Comprehensive Editor Statistics
changes.description: The editor now includes a word count feature, which provides details such as word count, character count, reading time, speech time, writing time, average word length, average sentence length, paragraph count, and more.

fixes.title: Firefox Compatibility
fixes.description: We've updated Helperbird to be compatible with the latest versions of Firefox, addressing previous compatibility issues.

upcoming.title: Upcoming Features
upcoming.description: In our next release, look forward to support for Enterprise Analytics, eBook compatibility, a comprehensive accessibility audit to further enhance user experience and inclusivity, and a redesigned Google Docs add-on.

changes.title: Drag and Drop Format
changes.description: The new update provides a drag and drop format to offer more convenience and enhance the user experience. Users can now easily drag and drop elements, making navigation within the platform more intuitive.

changes.title: Open PDF Toggle
changes.description: The newly introduced toggle feature now allows users to open PDFs directly in the PDF reader, simplifying document handling and increasing user efficiency.

changes.title: Ruler Settings
changes.description: A newly introduced feature allows users to change the color of the ruler based on their selected settings, adding a personalized touch to their Helperbird experience.

changes.title: Reading Mode Enhancements
changes.description: We've solved an overflow issue on titles in Reading mode, offering a smoother, distraction-free reading experience for users.

changes.title: PDF Reader Update
changes.description: A fix has been implemented to handle file overflows in the PDF reader, ensuring a seamless document viewing experience.

changes.title: Color Preservations in Shadow DOM
changes.description: We've addressed an issue where colors were being lost in the Shadow DOM, ensuring consistent and accurate color representation across all components.

changes.title: Speed Reading Feature
changes.description: The color initiation issue in the Speed Reading feature has been resolved. Furthermore, the entire Speed Reading feature has been rebuilt to enhance functionality and provide a smoother user experience.

changes.title: UI Improvements
changes.description: A design update has removed the grey bar around the toolbar to provide a cleaner, more streamlined interface. Additionally, the footer positioning has been optimized for better layout balance.

changes.title: Accessibility Audit
changes.description: We've performed an accessibility audit to ensure the platform is user-friendly and compliant with accessibility standards, making Helperbird more inclusive for all users.

changes.title: Text-to-Speech (TTS) and Word Prediction Updates
changes.description: The TTS feature now has improved voice update responsiveness. We've addressed an issue with color highlighting on change. Moreover, the Word Prediction feature has been refined for better performance. We've resolved the issue where the word prediction was adding a word three times in Google Docs.

changes.title: iPad Compatibility
changes.description: The issue where the dictionary feature was not functioning on iPad has been addressed and resolved. Now all iOS users can leverage the full functionality of Helperbird.

changes.title: Z-Index Updates
changes.description: We've addressed z-index issues on sliders and badges, ensuring a more smooth and consistent user interface.

changes.title: Sticky Notes Customization
changes.description: Users can now customize sticky notes, adding another layer of personalization to their Helperbird experience.

changes.title: Configuration Settings
changes.description: All color choices have now been moved to a centralized configuration setting, enabling easier and more intuitive color customization.

fixes.title: Fixed a variety of bugs including a major one that prevented the customization of sticky notes. A bug related to the speed reading feature overflow has been resolved, allowing users to read at high speed without any visual overflow issues.
Resolved a glitch where text-to-speech wasn't automatically updating voices, ensuring users always have access to the most current and natural-sounding voices.
Addressed a bug that affected dictionary function on iPads, ensuring consistent functionality across devices.
Fixed z-index issues on sliders and badges, resulting in a smoother, more visually consistent user experience.
Rectified a bug where text-to-speech color highlighting didn't function upon change, enhancing readability and user interaction.
Fixed an issue with the word prediction feature in Google Docs where it added a word three times, ensuring accurate and efficient predictive text.

changes.title: Font Preview
changes.description: In this update, users are now able to preview fonts before selecting them. This feature helps to ensure the chosen font is to the user's liking and suitability.

changes.title: Quick Actions Translation
changes.description: We've made improvements to the Quick Actions area. Users can now conveniently perform translations without any issues, making multilingual accessibility more efficient.

changes.title: Added More Color Options
changes.description: We've expanded the color options available across all features. With over 15 colors to choose from, users can now personalize their Helperbird experience to suit their preferences.

changes.title: Replaced Selects With Buttons
changes.description: To provide a more user-friendly and intuitive interface, all select options have been replaced with buttons.

fixes.title: Fixed Translation in Quick Actions
fixes.description: The issue with translation through the quick actions area has been addressed and resolved, making the tool more reliable and easy to use.

fixes.title: Minor Fixes and Improvements
fixes.description: This version includes a range of small fixes and improvements that enhance the overall user experience and functionality of Helperbird.

changes.title: Improved Navigation
changes.description: The bottom navigation has been divided into Writing, Reading, and Accessibility categories for easier access to specific features.

changes.title: Enhanced Math Support
changes.description: Helperbird now includes Maths Solving Support and Immersive Reader Support for Maths, providing assistance and an immersive reading experience for mathematical content.

changes.title: Expanded File Format Support
changes.description: Helperbird now supports Epub files, allowing users to access and read electronic books in that format. Additionally, offline support is now available, enabling users to utilize Helperbird even without an internet connection.

changes.title: Enhanced PDF Tools
changes.description: The PDF reader in Helperbird now offers new tools such as next page and back options, improving the overall reading experience for PDF documents.

changes.title: Improved User Interface
changes.description: Helperbird has undergone UI improvements to provide a smoother and more user-friendly experience, making it easier for new users to get accustomed to the tool.

changes.title: Faster Search
changes.description: Helperbird now includes a fast search feature, enabling users to quickly find specific functionalities or settings within the tool.

changes.title: Optimized Resource Usage
changes.description: Helperbird has been optimized to reduce its resource consumption, resulting in improved performance and a more efficient user experience.

fixes.title: Over 30 Major Fixes and Improvements
fixes.description: Version 104.0.1 includes a significant number of bug fixes and overall enhancements, addressing reported issues and refining the functionality of Helperbird.

fixes.title: UI Fixes
fixes.description: The user interface has undergone fixes and improvements to enhance its usability and visual appeal.

fixes.title: New Notification Bell
fixes.description: A new notification bell feature has been added to Helperbird, providing users with easy access to important notifications and updates.
